channel.title: Banned and need ideas on appeal
channel.description:
Ok, i was banned 4 years ago for trading with another stolen account. I appealed it saying sorry, etc. and it was denied. Today, i log in and have another appeal i can make. What should i say? should i say sorry again or tell them someone else had access to my account?
[code]We regret to inform you that this account has been banned due to password scamming & gaining items via account hijacking.
Our detection systems show this account trading with at least one other account that was hijacked at the time of the trade.
We do not discuss our detection processes.
You have been deemed to be in complete control at the time of the incident.[/code]

item.title: Banned and need ideas on appeal
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Really, just suck it up and either start a fresh account or quit the game.
People who phish for information from unsuspecting or less than savvy users, such as yourself, are scum.

Fuck off, you won’t find pity or help here.

Read full topic
item.source: Banned and need ideas on appeal

item.title: Banned and need ideas on appeal
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Say you’ll suicide if you don’t get unbanned because RuneScape was your life.

Read full topic
item.source: Banned and need ideas on appeal

item.title: Banned and need ideas on appeal
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

jagex does not unban for this one. You can physically appeal just like you can appeal macroing but they will not take it into consideration.

Read full topic
item.source: Banned and need ideas on appeal
